title: IIFL Securities to foray into wealth management
description: IIFL Securities' market capitalisation stood at ₹6,073 crore on Tuesday. In comparison, wealth management companies such as 360 One WAM, Nuvama Wealth Management, and Anand Rathi Wealth are valued at ₹28,535 crore, ₹17,913 crore, and ₹17,263 crore respectively.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
